skills.name: Git Commit (Auto Message)
skills.description: Stage all changes and commit with auto-generated message based on diff
skills.command: cd {{workDir}} && git add -A && git diff --cached --stat | head -20 && echo '---' && git commit -m "$(git diff --cached --stat | head -1 | sed 's/^ *//' | cut -d'|' -f1 | xargs echo 'Update:')"
